name: 1 Line Space Trader
overview: 1 Line Space Trader is a text based space trading game coded in a single line of basic code (hence the name) for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum, The game was inspired by the space trading portion of the popular 1980s space combat/space trading simulation, Elite. The game was developed by Digital Prawn (a coder based in the UK) and Einar Saukas (a Brazilian based coder) and released into the public domain in 2007.
